parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of pictures on this sketch

title: ISketch.IGetSketchPictures
description: Gets the pictures on this sketch.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of pictures on this sketch

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of pictures on this sketch VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
ISketch::GetSketchPictureCount
before calling this method to get the value of Count.
